definition.text: Use this command to add a new page to the Docs.

paragraphs.text: Single-Page Syntax
docs.add Node to Project: Docs Page Name
docs.add Concept to Project: Docs Page Name
docs.add Book to Project: Docs Page Name
Examples:
docs.add Node to Superalgos: Binance API
docs.add Concept to Superalgos: Two-way Reference
docs.add Book to Superalgos: User Manual
Page-Collection Syntax
docs.add Topic to Project: Docs Topic Name->Docs Page Name->Docs Page Number
docs.add Tutorial to Project: Docs Tutorial Name->Docs Page Name->Docs Page Number
docs.add Review to Project: Docs Review Name->Docs Page Name
Example:
docs.add Topic to Superalgos: Docs Styles->Docs Text Style->1
docs.add Tutorial to Superalgos: How to Build Indicators->Intro->1
docs.add Review to Project: Superalgos Project Review->Superalgos Review - Great Project!
Parameters
Project: It's the project where the page is defined.
Docs Page Category: One of the available categories.
Docs topic / tutorial / review name: The name of the topic / tutorial / review tthe new page will belong to.
Docs Page Name: The name of the page.
Docs Page Numer: Optional. The number affects the position in the corresponding table of contents only. If a Docs Page Number is not provided, the systems assigns one.
